subject: Re: [PATCH 02/13] VFS: move the start_dirop() kerndoc comment to before start_dirop()

reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown suggested moving the start_dirop() kerndoc comment to before start_dirop(), but no code changes were provided.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised concerns about the clarity and consistency of kernel-doc comments in the ovl_lookup_real_one() function, suggesting they be moved to a header comment for better readability.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed several patches in the series and approved them all, providing Reviewed-by tags for each one.
